name: Electronic memories
description:
In this game you take the role of the main character, a Dj Martin E's Fan, That he will forget the tickets for go to the concert of his favorite artist and he will go to his memory to remember.

Can you help he?

For the Indie game maker contest.

Dj Martin E Twitter:

https://twitter.com/DJMARTINGROOVY

Dj Martin E Soundcloud for more awesome music:

https://soundcloud.com/djmartinm
